Our Driving Instructors

Get to know us.

Find out more about our team of driving instructors at checkmirrors.

Sarah Hellowell

Sarah is the founder of checkmirrors.

She is an ADI with qualifications that include The Diamond Special Test, Pass Plus and Cardington Special Test. She has been a fully qualified instructor for over 17 years and takes pride in offering a professional, calm and safe environment that will help you pass your test.

Rob Kedge

Rob has 17 years experience as an ADI. He is a patient and friendly instructor able to adapt to teaching methods to suit each individual person. As well as an ADI Rob is a Pass Plus and Fleet trainer.

Ryan Fawcett

Ryan is a qualified driving instructor and has been teaching for over 2 and half years. Ryan is a Business Management graduate who has spent 5 years in sales before deciding to become a qualified driving instructor in York. Ryan enjoys working with all ages and thrives on the challenge and success of helping people pass their tests.

Ben Foster

Ben has 27 years of working in the catering and hospitality industry and so high standards of quality service are important to him. He has regular coached his team to achieve professional qualifications and he takes great satisfaction in helping others to achieve their goals.

Dave Dickinson

I was looking for a change of career and saw a checkmirrors car go by. My inquiries were dealt with by Sarah who then passed me on to Ryan to commence my training. I was delighted to pass my theory test (part 1) and practical test (part 2) first time. The support and guidance I have had from the checkmirrors team has been great.

Paul Reynolds

I have a passion for safe and professional driving due to being an Ambulance driver in the past. This profession trained and drilled into me how to drive in any situation safely and calmly. Then I moved on to an IT career which I have been in for the last 23 years. I have now decided to pass on my passion and experience and become a driving instructor. With my new car, which is a Tesla Model 3 automatic, I believe electric is the way forward for the environment and also in terms of safety as cars are been designed to be smarter with all the new technology. I was highly recommended Checkmirrors as a driving school due to their high standards which I have witnessed from the company's instructors.

Naaman Hudson

Web Developer

Naaman is the checkmirrors web developer and has been working in web development for over 10 years, he has worked with a range of different industries from automotive to financial services. Anything digital for checkmirrors, Naaman is our man.
